import { useMemo } from "react" import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom" import { Modal, ModalBody, ModalHeader } from 'reactstrap'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; const SingleNote = ({posts}) => { const params = useParams() const currentPost = useMemo(() => posts.find(post => post.id === parseInt(params.id)), [params.id, posts]) return(
setOpen(false)}>

{currentPost.title}

{currentPost.note}
) } export default SingleNote
